name: Dreyfus Strategic Municipal Bond Fund, Inc.
description: Dreyfus Strategic Municipal Bond Fund, Inc. (DSU) is a closed-end management investment company that primarily invests in a diversified portfolio of municipal bonds. The fund seeks to provide high current income exempt from federal income tax along with the preservation of capital. Established to capitalize on the growing demand for tax-efficient investment options, DSU focuses on investing in investment-grade municipal securities, which are typically issued by state and local governments to finance public projects. The fund aims to take advantage of favorable interest rate environments and the potential for capital appreciation. Managed by experienced professionals at Dreyfus, a subsidiary of BNY Mellon, DSU employs a disciplined investment approach, conducting thorough research and analysis to identify attractive investment opportunities. As part of its strategy, the fund may also engage in the use of leverage to enhance yields, while carefully managing the associated risks. With a commitment to providing its shareholders with stable income streams, DSU is a valuable option for investors seeking to diversify their portfolios with tax-exempt income sources.
